attributes.action: Officially sanction the japanese government in light of the proposed killing of whales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose a boycott on the purchase of all japanese goods while the japanese government insists on going through with the plans of killing up to 1000 whales for 'scientific' purposes. It hardly seems scientific that the meat of the killed animals is to be sold for human consumption.
Scientific research does not require the killing of an animal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
